r.s: Package for reading and writing OLE containers
r.d: This package allows reading and writing of OLE (Object Linking and Embedding) compound documents. This format is used as container for Excel (.xls), Word (.doc) and other Microsoft file formats.
r.n:
Rewrite of parser (no change to writer): - Files inside OLE container are now saved in directory structure. - Parser now properly uses Big Block, Small Block and Master Block Allocation Tables. - Added stream interface for reading files inside OLE container.
- Bug #6516. Fix "PPS at 1 has unknown type" errors. (Christian Schmidt) - Coding Standard cleanups (by helgi) - Bug #3951 OLE_PPS_File::init() does not return true on success (by helgi) - Bug #3955 OLE::_readPpsWks() does not return true on success (by helgi)
